title: Kaliskis - Novel Updates
author: AngHulingBaylan
description:
It’s the start of summer vacation. This is the time most-awaited by Roselda. Finally, she can wander again along the beach to gather shells and conches.


But on that particular summer, she found something more than a pretty shell or an exotic conch; she had befriended a water fairy, someone who dwelled from under the ocean.


She was swept into the world of her water fairy. And on her next ascent from the deep water, she was changed forever.


What mystery did she uncover?


Come, have a look and let’s take a plunge to the story behind―the Scales.>
